definition: extremely steep, an extremely steep face
details:
adjective
- extremely steep
= example: extremely steep
= synonyms: sharp
- at right angles to the plane of the horizon or a base line
= synonyms: vertical
- intersecting at or forming right angles
= example: intersecting at or forming right angles
noun
- an extremely steep face
- a cord from which a metal weight is suspended pointing directly to the earth's center of gravity
= synonyms: plumb line
- a Gothic style in 14th and 15th century England
= synonyms: perpendicular style
- a straight line at right angles to another line
